chapters.title: Chapter 3: The Ways of Honor
chapters.info: Dorindha, p. 84—Wife of Bael, and sister-wife to Melaine. She is roofmistress to Smoke Springs Hold, and has three sons. Her long red hair is touched with white. She is now traveling with Bael and the rest of the Goshien clan in Arad Doman. She and the other Wise Ones there are in charge of furthering Aviendha's training. See also Bael; Melaine.
